languages.text: "Не советую вам ссориться с Вольным Торговцем. У этого будут неприятные последствия".
"I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."
languages.original_text: "Не советую вам ссориться с Вольным Торговцем. У этого будут неприятные последствия".

traits.locale_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."
"I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

"I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

languages.text: “我建议你们不要和行商浪人发生冲突，否则后果可能会相当不堪设想。”
languages.original_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

traits.locale_text: “我建议你们不要和行商浪人发生冲突，否则后果可能会相当不堪设想。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者といさかいは起こさぬよう忠告しておこう。お前たちにとっては愉快でない結果になるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者といさかいは起こさぬよう忠告しておこう。お前たちにとっては愉快でない結果になるだろう」

languages.text: «Le desaconsejo que busque problemas con {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. Las consecuencias le resultarán muy desagradables».
languages.original_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

traits.locale_text: «Le desaconsejo que busque problemas con {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. Las consecuencias le resultarán muy desagradables».

languages.text: « Je vous déconseille d'entrer en conflit avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Vous trouveriez les conséquences fort déplaisantes. »
languages.original_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous déconseille d'entrer en conflit avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Vous trouveriez les conséquences fort déplaisantes. »

languages.text: "Ich rate davon ab, einen Streit mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} vom Zaun zu brechen. Denn das wird sehr unangenehme Folgen für Euch haben."
languages.original_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

traits.locale_text: "Ich rate davon ab, einen Streit mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} vom Zaun zu brechen. Denn das wird sehr unangenehme Folgen für Euch haben."

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'le tartışmaya girmemeni tavsiye ederim. Karşı karşıya kalabileceğin sonuçlar nahoş olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I advise against getting into a dispute with a Rogue Trader. The consequences for you will be very unpleasant."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'le tartışmaya girmemeni tavsiye ederim. Karşı karşıya kalabileceğin sonuçlar nahoş olabilir."
